page.title: 03A TYPICAL SCHOOLDAY
page.content: I GET UP AT SEVEN AND WATCH T.V. UNTIL QUARTER PAST. I HAVE BREAKFAST, A CEREAL, AND GET DRESSED. I SET OFF FOR RASCA AT 7.45. RASCA IS A PLACE THAT LOOKS AFTER CHILDREN WHILE THEIR PARENTS ARE AT WORK. MY MUM WORKS THERE. WHEN I GET THERE I PLAY GAMES ON THE COMPUTER. WE SET OFF FOR SCHOOL AT 8.40 AND ARRIVE AT 8.45. I MEET MY FRIENDS AND WE PLAY GAMES. WHEN THE BELL RINGS WE LINE UP AND WE GO INTO ASSEMBLY. AFTER THAT WE DO ENGLISH AND HAVE A BREAK AT 10.35. MY FRIENDS AND I PLAY TWO-BALL ON THE WALL. WHEN THE BELL RINGS AGAIN WE LINE UP AND DO MATHS. AFTER MATHS WE HAVE DINNER AT 12.00 AND THEN IT IS PLAYTIME AGAIN. IN THE AFTERNOON WE DO TOPIC. THE BELL RINGS FOR LAST BREAK AT 2.15. AFTER THAT WE CARRY ON WITH OUR TOPIC AND HAVE STORY BEFORE GOING HOME AT 3.30.
